title: Hotel details object
description: Schema of a hotel details object

checkinout_policy.description:
Describes the check-in/check-out policy for the hotel. Should be in the language indicated by the 'lang'
parameter. Max length 1000 characters.

amenities.description:
Amenities that are generally available at the hotel, not specific to a room. Each string is free text which
should be in the language indicated by the 'lang' parameter

address2.description: Additional address information about the hotel

photos.description:
URLs for photos of the hotel to be displayed during the booking process. If no photos are available, an empty
array should be returned.

address1.description: Street and number of the hotel
